title: Acura’s Next NSX Could Return as a Hybrid Supercar
description: Acura isn’t giving up on EVs, but it is shifting direction. The brand has built hybrids before, but more recently promised to move past them and go fully electric. Now, with EV adoption in the U.S. moving slower than expected and buyers still wanting a middle ground, Acura is bringing hybrids back. ...
titleSummary: "A New Chapter for NSX: Hybrid Revival on the Horizon"
descriptionSummary: Acura's electric ambitions have taken a detour. Initially planning to ditch hybrids for full-electric models, the brand now seems poised to reclaim its hybrid roots as US consumers continue to prioritize fuel-efficient alternatives over pure EVs.

title: Drivers Spend Most of Their Salaries on Gas in These US States
description: Unless you are a proud owner of an electric car, you know that paying for gas is an expense that cannot be ignored for the life of you. It’s one of those routine costs that sneaks up on your budget every week, and depending on where you live, it can take a much bigger bite out of your paycheck than ...
titleSummary: "Fueling Expenses Leave Many Americans in the Red Across Several Key States"
descriptionSummary: For many drivers, fuel expenses are a constant concern, devouring a significant portion of their weekly budget. But what if there was a way to rein in these costs and break free from the cycle of pricey gasoline?

title: US-Spec Honda Prelude Gets A Leg Up Versus JDM Version
description: The return of the Honda Prelude has been one of the most talked-about events this week. After a 24-year absence, Honda's two-door sports coupe has officially returned, the first time the model has adopted a hybrid powertrain. Announced for both Japan and the United States, the revival has drawn ...
titleSummary: "Honda Prelude Takes Center Stage in US Market with Key Changes Unveiled"
descriptionSummary: Honda's iconic Prelude makes a triumphant comeback after a 24-year hiatus, boasting a groundbreaking hybrid powertrain that's set to shake up the sports coupe landscape in both Japan and North America.

title: GM CEO Mary Barra sells off 40% of holdings in the automaker
description: General Motors CEO Mary Barra sold 40% of her holdings in the automaker last month, disposing of 372,024 shares on August 28, according to a filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). The sale Barra earned $21.67 million, based on current market prices, and leaves her with ...
titleSummary: GM Chief Exec Cuts Ties with Company by Unloading Major Stake
descriptionSummary: General Motors CEO Mary Barra made a significant move last month by divesting nearly half of her company holdings, unloading 372,024 shares worth an estimated $21.67 million, as reported in a recent SEC filing.

title: The Factors Causing EV Insurance to Be 49% More Expensive Than Gas Cars
description: A new study has revealed that electric vehicles (EVs) cost about 49% more to insure on average than gas-powered cars. The analysis from Insurify also reports that EV insurance costs have increased by 16% over the last 12 months, and EV drivers pay $4,058 per year for coverage, versus the average ...
titleSummary: "Electric Shock: Why EV Owners Face a 49% Premium Price Tag"
descriptionSummary: Electric vehicle owners can expect to shell out significantly more for car insurance, with a recent study showing an average premium hike of nearly 50% compared to gasoline-powered vehicles. Annual costs have also surged by 16% over the past year.

title: Porsche and Audi EVs Are Joining Tesla's Supercharging Network
description: In a Tesla earnings call in 2013, CEO Elon Musk expressed his desire to open up the company's Supercharging network of EV fast chargers to other brands, noting that Tesla's intent is not to create a "walled garden" regarding this technology. Though Tesla owners have enjoyed one of the most reliable ...
titleSummary: Electric Road Warriors Unite: Porsche, Audi Bolt onto Tesla's Speedy Supercharger Network
descriptionSummary: During a 2013 earnings call, Elon Musk signaled his intention to open up Tesla's Supercharger network to rival electric vehicles, emphasizing the company's commitment to sharing its fast-charging technology rather than creating exclusive access for its own customers.

title: Another Toyota Recall: Why the Most Reliable Brand Keeps Making Headlines
description: Toyota and Lexus are recalling approximately 62,000 vehicles in the United States due to a potentially dangerous defroster malfunction that could reduce driver visibility and increase crash risk. The recall affects certain units of the electric Toyota bZ4X, Lexus RZ300e, and RZ450e vehicles, where ...
titleSummary: "Toyota's Reliability Reputation Takes Hit with Yet Another Widespread Vehicle Recall"
descriptionSummary: Toyota and Lexus are issuing a recall for nearly 62,000 US vehicles due to a faulty defroster system that could impair driver visibility and boost crash risk. The issue affects specific models of their electric SUVs, including the bZ4X and RZ series.

title: Tesla CEO Musk Stands to Earn Unprecedented $1 Trillion Under New Pay Package
description: Times have been rough for Elon Musk lately. First, a Delaware judge blocked a $50 billion executive compensation package. And his role as one of America’s most admired men vanished in the wake of his role as a key advisor to Pres. Donald Trump – the two men now engaged in a simmering feud. But Musk ...
titleSummary: Musk's Mega Payday: New Deal Puts Billionaire CEO on Track for Uncharted Wealth Heights
descriptionSummary: Elon Musk has faced a tumultuous few months, marked by a Delaware court's rejection of his proposed $50 billion compensation deal and a public falling out with former ally President Donald Trump.

title: Trump’s Tariff Deal Gives Japanese Cars Edge Over European Competition
description: President Trump has signed an executive order reducing tariffs on Japanese auto imports from 27.5% down to 15%, implementing the deal negotiated in July. The order takes effect seven days after publication and applies retroactively to August 7. The White House calls it a win for U.S. consumers, but ...
titleSummary: US Trade Truce Boosts Japanese Autos at Expense of EU Rivals
descriptionSummary: President Trump has issued an executive order that slashes import tariffs on Japanese autos from 27.5% to 15%, bringing a July agreement into effect. The change takes hold seven days after publication and extends back to August 7.

title: Porsche Just Made Plugging In Your EV Obsolete
description: Porsche wireless charging is finally here, and it's debuting with the new Cayenne Electric in late 2025. This isn't just another tech feature, it's the German automaker's answer to making electric vehicle charging as seamless as possible. Porsche’s inductive charging system completely eliminates ...
titleSummary: "Porsche Takes Electric Charging on the Road with Breakthrough Tech"
descriptionSummary: Porsche is set to revolutionize EV ownership with the introduction of wireless charging technology, slated for the new Cayenne Electric in late 2025. This innovative feature streamlines the charging process for a more effortless driving experience.

title: The Feds Put Hyundai's Electric Dreams on Ice in Georgia Raid
description: A massive immigration enforcement operation at Hyundai's Georgia EV Metaplant has detained 475 workers and halted construction at the state's largest economic development project. The raid directly impacts production of the Ioniq 5 and Ioniq 9 electric vehicles while disrupting critical battery ...
titleSummary: Hyundai's Electric Ambitions Frozen Solid in Shocking Georgia Bust
descriptionSummary: A major immigration crackdown on workers at Hyundai's Georgia factory has resulted in the detention of nearly 500 employees, effectively grounding production of the company's flagship electric vehicles, the Ioniq 5 and Ioniq 9.

title: The Electric GLC Has Mercedes' Largest Screen To Date
description: The GLC has been a part of Mercedes-Benz’s SUV lineup for a while now, but it’s about to receive one of its most significant updates yet. The automaker recently announced the new electric GLC with EQ Technology, debuting the first vehicle in its catalog to feature its new design language. Mercedes ...
titleSummary: "Mercedes Hits the Road with its Most Epic In-Car Display Yet"
descriptionSummary: Mercedes-Benz's compact SUV, the GLC, is poised for a major overhaul as the automaker introduces an all-electric variant equipped with cutting-edge EQ Technology and a fresh new design aesthetic that heralds a new era for the brand.

title: BMW CEO Slams EU’s 2035 Combustion Ban as “Big Mistake,” Praises Strong 2025 Sales
description: BMW CEO Oliver Zipse has doubled down on his criticism of the European Union’s plan to outlaw internal combustion engine cars by 2035, calling the move a “big mistake.” Speaking after BMW’s latest earnings report, Zipse argued that the ban focuses narrowly on tailpipe emissions while ignoring ...
titleSummary: "BMW Chief Fires Back at EU's Fossil Fuel Phasing-Out Plan, Citing Surging Sales"
descriptionSummary: BMW's CEO Oliver Zipse has forcefully rejected the EU's proposal to phase out internal combustion engines by 2035, deeming it a misstep in addressing air pollution. He argues the plan overlooks broader environmental considerations and favors short-term gains over long-term sustainability.

title: Porsche’s 2028 Macan Replacement Defies 94 Years of Tradition With Front-Drive Setup
description: In 2028, Porsche will introduce the M1, the first production model with a front-wheel drive bias. Since the combustion-engine Macan was phased out in favour of the all-electric Macan, the new Macan replacement will be built on the same Premium Platform Combustion (PPC) architecture as the ...
titleSummary: Porsche Dares to Disrupt with Rear-Seat-Friendly Macan Redesign for a New Era
descriptionSummary: Porsche is poised to revolutionize its lineup in 2028 with the M1, a pioneering front-wheel drive model that marks a significant departure from traditional Porsche design. It shares its underpinnings with the electric Macan and other PPC-based vehicles.

title: Mugen Unveils Aftermarket Kit for New Honda Prelude
description: The Honda Prelude hasn’t even hit dealer lots yet, but Mugen is already here to make it sharper, louder, and unmistakably Honda. The Japanese tuner, whose name is synonymous with factory-backed performance, has unveiled an aftermarket kit for the coupe, proving that the Prelude’s return is an ...
titleSummary: "Honda Prelude Gets a Turbo Boost with Mugen's High-Performance Upgrade"
descriptionSummary: Mugen is wasting no time making a statement with the newly released Honda Prelude. This renowned Japanese tuner has crafted a bold aftermarket package that amplifies the coupe's edginess and unmistakably embodies Honda's performance spirit.

title: Ford EV sales soared in August, led by the Mustang Mach-E
description: Ford has a limited and aging EV lineup, but there's still strong demand for what the Blue Oval has got. The automaker just recorded its best August for EV sales yet, with combined sales of the Mustang Mach-E, F-150 Lightning, and E-Transit totaling 10,671 units, representing a 19.3% increase over ...
titleSummary: Mustang Mach-E Drives Electric Growth for Ford in August Sales Surge
descriptionSummary: Ford's electric vehicle lineup may be relatively small, but it's still generating significant interest. The company has just reported its strongest August for EV sales to date, with nearly 11,000 vehicles sold across three models.

title: Porsche Joins Tesla’s Supercharger Network — Here’s How Owners Can Plug In
description: Porsche has done more than most legacy automakers to prove that an electric vehicle can be an exciting option. The Taycan is one of the earliest premium EVs to challenge Tesla, with renown not limited to design but also in terms of performance, in a way that made the car feel like a true Porsche ...
titleSummary: Porsche's Charging Revival: New Partnership Plugs Owners into Tesla's Extensive Network
descriptionSummary: Porsche has boldly defied tradition by crafting an electrifying driving experience with its Taycan, a pioneering luxury EV that not only rivals Tesla's premium offerings but also embodies the brand's signature performance and style.

title: Rivian Cuts Jobs Ahead of $45K R2 SUV Launch
description: The commercial team adapts as Rivian trims 1.5% of staff to ensure a smooth R2 SUV launch.
titleSummary: Rivian Prepares for Skid as Luxury Electric SUV Hits Market Next Month
descriptionSummary: Rivian's commercial team makes strategic adjustments in response to a targeted workforce reduction of 1.5%, paving the way for a seamless introduction of the highly anticipated R2 SUV model.

title: NHTSA Moves to Ease Rules to Advance Driverless Car Technology
description: The Trump administration is making moves that would make it easier for autonomous vehicle technology companies like Waymo and Tesla to move ahead with their advanced robotaxi systems, removing some requirements that are centered around vehicles designed for human drivers. In an announcement on ...
titleSummary: "Regulators Relax Restrictions on Self-Driving Cars to Boost Innovation"
descriptionSummary: The Trump administration has introduced regulatory changes aimed at streamlining the development of self-driving taxis from companies like Waymo and Tesla, easing constraints tied to traditional driver-oriented vehicle design.

title: New 2026 Lexus Models Cost More, But There’s Good News for Some Buyers
description: Lexus has begun releasing 2026-model-year pricing, and while information for the entire lineup isn't available yet, we know that some popular models will see price increases. That's to be expected as automakers deal with the Trump Administration's tariffs and the uncertainty they're bringing to the ...
titleSummary: Lexus 2026 Price Hike Hits Some Owners, but Others Can Expect a Discount
descriptionSummary: Lexus is rolling out 2026 model prices, but details are still emerging for their full lineup. Notably, several high-demand vehicles will incur cost hikes due to ongoing trade tensions and related tariff adjustments.

title: Ford Explorer and Navigator Owners: Check If Your SUV Is Part of This Recall
description: It's a day of the week that ends in "y," and that means Ford has another recall out. As the brand works to improve quality control, it has been on a recall blitz for the last several years. Some 213,000 Ford Explorer and Lincoln Navigator SUVs are the latest victims. Towing may not be the first ...
titleSummary: "Thousands of Explorers and Navigators Recalled: Owners Urged to Verify Their Vehicle's Status"
descriptionSummary: Ford is issuing yet another recall in a string of efforts to boost its quality standards, this time targeting approximately 213,000 Explorer and Lincoln Navigator SUV owners who may face issues with towing capabilities.

title: Jaguar Land Rover Faces Major Cybersecurity Attack
description: British luxury auto magnate Jaguar Land Rover is facing yet another speed bump, as it announced in a statement on September 2 that it had been hit by what it calls a "cyber incident." In a statement posted prominently on its website, the firm noted that it "took immediate action to mitigate its ...
titleSummary: "High-Profile Carmaker Hit with Massive Data Breach Overnight"
descriptionSummary: Jaguar Land Rover has encountered a significant setback, following a recent cybersecurity breach. The luxury auto manufacturer swiftly took measures to contain and mitigate the impact of the incident, which was disclosed through an official statement on their website.

title: First Look: BMW’s New iX3 is the Shape of What’s to Come
description: Where the Bavarian automaker once planned to go with flexible platforms capable of using a variety of different powertrain technologies – from all-gas to all-electric – the Neue Klasse models are exclusively EV, a move BMW says will allow it to deliver better performance, longer range, faster ...
titleSummary: "BMW Unveils iX3: A Glimpse into the Brand's Electric Future Takes Shape"
descriptionSummary: As part of its bold new strategy, BMW's latest models in the Neue Klasse series will be electric vehicles only. This shift enables the company to optimize performance, extend driving ranges, and accelerate charging capabilities, further cementing its commitment to sustainable motoring.

title: You Can Wirelessly Charge The Porsche Cayenne EV Like a Smartphone
description: If you own a new-ish smartphone capable of wireless charging, you would probably know that it is virtually impossible to live without it once you get a taste of the sheer convenience it can provide. Apart from the wires that stick out from the wireless charging pad itself, the whole process is ...
titleSummary: "Plugless Charging Comes to Porsche's Electric Cayenne in Groundbreaking New Feature"
descriptionSummary: Once you experience the luxury of wireless charging, it's hard to imagine life without it. Convenient and hassle-free, this technology has become an essential part of daily life for smartphone owners who've upgraded their device with this feature.

title: Ford's Popular Midsize Truck Faces Down A Six-Figure Recall
description: Ford leads the pack in recalls issued this year. It's a title no automaker wants, but Ford will have to live with it while it straightens out quality control in its vast lineup. This time around, the mid-sized Ford Ranger pickup truck is the victim, with more than 100,000 trucks recalled by the ...
titleSummary: "Ford Issues Major Safety Alert for its Best-Selling Mid-Size Pickup Model"
descriptionSummary: Ford takes the lead in recalls this year, a dubious distinction that underscores the need for improved quality control across its extensive range of vehicles. Over 100,000 mid-size Rangers are being called back to fix safety issues.

title: 1997 Land Rover Defender Headlines eBay's 30-Year Anniversary Collection
description: If you've been yearning for the era when Nickelodeon was king and Tamagotchis were all the rage, eBay is looking to teleport you backwards in time. The online retailer is celebrating 30 years by opening what they call the "’95 Shop," a retail pop-up and online storefront spotlighting iconic ...
titleSummary: "Timeless off-roader leads eBay's milestone celebration of three decades in business"
descriptionSummary: Get ready to time-travel back to the radical '90s with eBay's latest throwback celebration. The online retailer has launched its "Time Capsule" section, a retro revival featuring nostalgic items from the bygone era of Nickelodeon, Tamagotchis, and more.

title: Ford CEO: VW Alliance Saves Billions, Not Just Badges
description: Ford CEO Jim Farley has made it clear: the company’s partnership with Volkswagen isn’t just about shared badges, it’s about saving serious money. Speaking during Ford’s Q2 2025 earnings call, Farley pointed out that sharing platforms with VW is helping Ford slash development costs and complexity ...
titleSummary: "Ford's VW Deal: A Cost-Saving Partnership with More Than Just Brand Benefits"
descriptionSummary: Ford's CEO Jim Farley has emphasized the financial benefits of its partnership with Volkswagen, citing reduced development expenses and streamlined operations as key advantages of their collaborative approach.

title: The Dodge Charger Daytona's Fake Exhaust Is So Good It Got Real Police Attention
description: Picture this: you're driving the most advanced electric muscle car on the market, feeling pretty good about your zero-emission footprint, when suddenly you're pulled over for... a loud exhaust? That's exactly what happened to one Dodge Charger Daytona EV owner in Minnesota, whose synthesized ...
titleSummary: "Fakers in Chief: A Fake Sound Gets the Cops Knocking on the Dodge Charger Daytona's Door"
descriptionSummary: Imagine cruising behind the wheel of an eco-friendly electric supercar, basking in the glow of reduced emissions, only to be stopped by police - ironically - for excessively loud noise. A bizarre incident unfolded for a Dodge Charger Daytona EV driver in Minnesota.

title: Shaq’s New Corvette Z06 Makes Every Other Sports Car Look Small
description: When you are 7-foot-1 like Shaquille O’Neal, most cars are off-limits. Even roomy SUVs like the Jeep Wrangler feel cramped. So when Shaq set his sights on Chevrolet’s C8 Corvette Z06, a car already known for its snug cabin, he needed serious modifications. Effortless Motors answered the call, and ...
titleSummary: NBA Legend Shows Off His Insane New Ride: A Corvette Z06 That's a Real Showstopper
descriptionSummary: At 7-foot-1, standard cars can be a tight squeeze - even spacious SUVs feel cramped. So when Shaquille O'Neal eyed the Chevrolet Corvette Z06, notorious for its compact interior, he turned to Effortless Motors for a customized solution that would fit his imposing frame.

title: Even With $11,000 Discounts, Volkswagen Struggles to Sell Its Most Affordable EV
description: Volkswagen is cutting production of its ID.4 electric SUV at its Chattanooga, Tennessee plant after dealers were left struggling to clear lots. The pause, which begins in late October, will furlough about 160 workers, though VW says employees will receive 80% pay during the downtime. The company ...
titleSummary: "Volkswagen's Cheapest Electric Car Fails to Find Buyers Despite Big Price Cuts"
descriptionSummary: Volkswagen is temporarily halting production of its ID.4 electric SUV at its Tennessee factory due to a buildup of inventory, affecting around 160 workers who will be furloughed with partial pay until further notice starting in late October.

title: Ford F-150 Owners Sue Over Oil-Thirsty V8 Engines
description: Ford’s 5.0-liter Coyote V8 has built a reputation as one of the most dependable, enthusiast-loved engines in the truck world. But now, it’s the subject of a class-action lawsuit claiming the opposite: that certain F-150s burn oil at alarming rates, sometimes faster than they use gasoline. The case, ...
titleSummary: "F-150 Drivers Take Ford to Court Over Gas-Guzzling V8 Problem"
descriptionSummary: Ford's iconic 5.0-liter Coyote V8 has long been revered for its reliability and popularity among truck enthusiasts. However, a recent class-action lawsuit alleges that some F-150 models experience excessively high oil consumption, potentially outpacing their fuel usage.

title: Kia EV9 Easily Outselling Hyundai Ioniq 9 — But Which One Should You Buy?
description: Hyundai and Kia have both just reported record sales for August, continuing months of strong momentum for the Korean brands in the United States. It’s always intriguing to compare their sales, since multiple Hyundai and Kia cars share the same platforms, powertrains, and technologies—it’s chiefly ...
titleSummary: Kia's Electric SUV Steals the Spotlight as Hyundai's Luxe Offering Falters
descriptionSummary: Hyundai and Kia are riding a wave of success in the US market, with both brands posting record August sales numbers. A closer look at their performance reveals some interesting parallels given their shared underpinnings and systems.

title: Ford Performance Is Now Ford Racing in Push to Connect Track and Street
description: Ford Performance is being rebranded as Ford Racing as the Blue Oval aims to emphasize the connection between its many racing programs and its performance road cars. The newly renamed Ford Racing will still be responsible for both, so it doesn't appear that its operations will change. But the move ...
titleSummary: "Ford Shifts Gears: Uniting High-Octane Passion on Two Tracks"
descriptionSummary: Ford's high-performance division is adopting a new name, shifting from Ford Performance to Ford Racing. This change seeks to strengthen ties between the automaker's racing endeavors and its line of performance-driven road cars. Operations remain largely intact.

title: Gen Z Drivers Continue to Text and Drive Despite the Risks
description: Despite years of awareness campaigns and tougher traffic laws, distracted driving isn’t going away. Instead, it’s shifting. Gen Z, the first generation to grow up with smartphones in their hands, is leading the way in risky behaviors behind the wheel. According to a new survey from Insurify, 68% of ...
titleSummary: "Generation Risk: Teens Refuse to Hang Up While Behind the Wheel"
descriptionSummary: Young drivers are defying decades of safety efforts, trading traditional hazards for modern distractions. A new study reveals that nearly seven in ten Gen Z motorists engage in reckless driving habits, fueled by constant smartphone access and a unique mindset.

title: Mercedes-Benz Teases Upcoming G-Class Cabriolet
description: When Mercedes-Benz heavily revamped the ever-iconic Geländewagen for its 2019 model year, we were left uncertain as to whether any of its quirky variants or special editions – the incredible cabriolet included – would ever return. Thankfully, now we have an official answer, as Mercedes-Benz has ...
titleSummary: "Top Down, Tough Out: Mercedes Unveils Convertible Version of Iconic Off-Roader"
descriptionSummary: After a major overhaul in 2019, doubts arose about the future of the Geländewagen's unique variants, including the convertible. Fortunately, Mercedes-Benz has recently confirmed that select special editions will continue to roll off their production line.

title: Honda Prelude Returns to US After 24 Years with 200-HP Hybrid Power
description: The old gang is getting back together. In its early days in the U.S. market, three products dominated the Honda line-up: the Civic, Accord and Prelude. The latter model last rolled down the assembly line in 2001, but if things go according to plan, a sixth-generation Honda Prelude will land in U.S. ...
titleSummary: "Honda's Beloved Sport Sedan Revives American Market with High-Tech Hybrid Muscle"
descriptionSummary: The iconic trio of Honda's early years is reuniting. After a nearly two-decade hiatus, the long-awaited revival of the Prelude is on the horizon, with rumors hinting at a new sixth generation hitting American roads soon.

title: America's Only Plug-In Hybrid Minivan Loses $7,500 Tax Credit
description: The Pacifica is the last of Chrysler's once vast lineup, and it's easy to see why. Buyers love the practical, relatively affordable minivan, and the fuel economy benefits of its plug-in hybrid, or PHEV, trim make it all the more enticing. That's doubly true given its current $7,500 federal EV tax ...
titleSummary: Hybrid Minivan Owners Face Price Hike Without Favored Tax Break
descriptionSummary: As Chrysler's final remaining minivan model, the Pacifica has won over many fans with its sensible design and budget-friendly price tag. Its plug-in hybrid variant is a standout for its impressive fuel efficiency and generous tax credits.

title: Audi CEO: We Have 100 Steering Wheel Options — We Only Need Four
description: Luxury buyers like to customize. Porsche offers millions of options and possible combinations for each of the vehicles in its extensive lineup of sports cars, sedans, wagons, and SUVs. Other brands do too, like Audi. However, Audi will adjust its approach following the debut of its new Concept C ...
titleSummary: Audi's CEO Claims Excess in Design, Argues Simplicity Will Reign Supreme
descriptionSummary: Avid luxury car enthusiasts crave personalization. Porsche's expansive range offers countless customization possibilities, but rival brand Audi is set to adapt its strategy following a significant reveal: the introduction of its sleek Concept C.

title: Everything We Know About the Upcoming 2026 BMW iX3
description: If you don’t like the current BMW design language, that may change with the arrival of its biggest change to date: the next design era, known as Neue Klasse. Its first model will be the fully electric iX3, which will debut at the BMW Group Keynote on September 5th. BMW tells us that the Neue Klasse ...
titleSummary: BMW Unveils Plans for Electric SUV, Set to Shake Up the Market in 2026
descriptionSummary: BMW is poised for a significant styling overhaul with its Neue Klasse, a new design era set to launch this fall. The first model to embody this fresh look will be the all-electric iX3, premiering at the BMW Group Keynote on September 5th.

title: Your Next EV Charge Might Take Place at a Gas Station
description: One seemingly obvious difference between EVs and gas cars is the way each vehicle is refueled, but charging an electric car can be a wildly different experience from filling up a car's or truck's gas tank. In the heyday of highway motoring, full-service stations used to do much more than fill up ...
titleSummary: Electric Cars Get Charged Up at Familiar Fuel Stops
descriptionSummary: Fueling an electric vehicle is a distinct departure from the traditional gas station experience. Gone are the days of bustling roadside stops where attendants not only filled tanks but also provided services and amenities that came with the journey.
